# Data Exploration

### Import Data
```{r}
data_raw <- read.csv('ToyotaCorollaData.csv')

data <- data_raw %>%
  mutate_at(c('Metallic', 'Automatic', 'Doors', 'Cylinders', 'Gears', 
              'Guarantee', 'BOVAG'),
            as.factor)

head(data)
```
